atm.description: Gives 1000 metal and 1000 energy to the issuing player's team

cheat.description: Enables/Disables cheating, which is required for a lot of other commands to be usable

destroy.description: Destroys one or multiple units by unit-ID, instantly

desync.description: Allows creating an artificial desync of the local client with the rest of the participating hosts

devlua.description: Enables/Disables Lua dev-mode (can cause desyncs if enabled)

editdefs.description: Allows/Disallows editing of unit-, feature- and weapon-defs through Lua

give.description: Places one or multiple units of a single or multiple types on the map, instantly; by default belonging to your own team

globallos.description: Enables/Disables global line-of-sight, which makes the whole map permanently visible to everyone or to a specific allyteam

godmode.description: Enables/Disables god-mode, which allows all players (even spectators) to control all units (even during replays, which will DESYNC them)

luagaia.description: Allows reloading or disabling LuaGaia, and to send a chat message to LuaGaia scripts

luarules.description: Allows reloading or disabling LuaRules, and to send a chat message to LuaRules scripts

nocost.description: Enables/Disables everything-for-free, which allows everyone to build everything for zero resource costs

nospecdraw.description: Allows/Disallows spectators to draw on the map

nospectatorchat.description: Enables/Disables spectators to use the chat

skip.description: Fast-forwards to a given frame, or stops fast-forwarding

take.description: Transfers all units of allied teams without any active players to the team of the issuing player
